name: Mariusz Jan Skobel
profile_summary:
Senior Backend Engineer with extensive experience in delivering high-performance software solutions, specializing in **TypeScript**, **Node.js**, and **PostgreSQL**. Proficient in using **Docker** for containerization and adept with **REST** and **GraphQL** APIs, ensuring seamless communication between services. Experienced in both relational and **NoSQL** databases, utilizing technologies like **rqlite** for efficient data handling. Proven ability to develop robust backend systems with proficiency in **Golang**, contributing to scalable and efficient architectures. Skilled in Agile methodologies, adaptability to **Cloud Services**, and proficient with **WebSockets** for real-time data exchange.

Brings over 10 years of full-stack development experience with hands-on expertise in **JavaScript/TypeScript**, **Python**, and frameworks such as **FastAPI** and **Django**. Known for building and deploying cloud-native applications on **Azure** and **AWS**, while ensuring compliance with industry standards such as HIPAA, FHIR, PCI DSS, and SOC 2. Strong background in microservices architecture and CI/CD automation, with a passion for creating systems that provide real-world impact and seamless collaboration.

•	Integrated **GraphQL** and **REST** APIs to support seamless data interaction between client applications and the server, improving data retrieval speeds by 30%.
•	Implemented containerization with **Docker** to standardize deployment processes across different environments, enhancing the development workflow and reducing deployment times by 25%.
•	Optimized database performance by leveraging both **SQL** and **NoSQL** strategies, achieving a 40% increase in data access speeds in high-traffic scenarios.
•	Adopted an **Agile** methodology to facilitate continuous integration and delivery, improving team productivity by 20% and accelerating project timelines.
•	Collaborated effectively with cross-functional teams to ensure clear communication of project goals and expectations, leading to a 15% improvement in stakeholder satisfaction.
•	Utilized **WebSockets** for real-time communication capabilities in applications, enhancing user engagement and experience by allowing live data updates.
•	Maintained and optimized legacy systems by incorporating **etcd** for distributed key-value storage, ensuring configuration consistency across multiple services.
•	Participated in code reviews and architectural discussions, bringing in fresh perspectives and leading to a refactoring initiative that reduced system complexity by 30%.
•	Actively engaged with stakeholders to gather requirements and establish collaborative solutions, improving project clarity and execution.

Utilized **TypeScript**, **Node.js** (NestJS/Express), and **Golang** to develop and modernize backend systems, enhancing performance and maintainability for high-volume transaction environments.
Implemented **PostgreSQL** and **NoSQL** databases for efficient data storage and retrieval, ensuring scalability and reliability in financial applications.
Designed and maintained RESTful and GraphQL APIs to support seamless communication between frontend applications and backend services while adhering to best practices in architecture.
Employed **Docker** for containerization, achieving consistent deployments across development, staging, and production environments, facilitating a **90% reduction** in configuration-related issues.
Collaborated in an **Agile** environment, participating in regular sprint planning sessions and code reviews, enhancing team productivity and code quality through effective communication.
Integrated **WebSockets** for real-time data transmission and notifications, significantly improving user interaction and responsiveness in financial applications.

Conducted thorough performance tuning and optimization of database queries and application logic, achieving response time improvements of **20%** across key metrics.
Fostered collaboration among cross-functional teams to deliver high-quality software solutions that meet business requirements and regulatory compliance standards.
